name: Cold Eyes
description:
Survive against sums of enemies by aiming for the Eyes!

Watch out for the time distortions! They slow or speed you up. But your enemies as well!

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
R - Reset
Space - jump
Left Mouse - Shoot

Not going to lie this was pretty scuffed!

Submitted to LUDUM DARE 49 (Made in 48 hours)

Full Source can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/DraperDanMan/ludum-dare-49
